name: Feed The Rabbit
description:
Note: better screen resolution on downloaded version!Your biggest experiment gone horribly wrong and your experimental rabbit got so big it busted up the cage. Now it's getting hungrier by the minute and tries to escape to the city to find something bigger to eat. You better keep it fed and maybe you can get it back to its normal cute bunny form. Goal of the Game:

Feed all items laying around to the rabbit before time runs out.

How to play:

Pick up carrots and cabbages and throw them into the rabbit's mouth/head. You can also push items to the rabbit where possible.

Use your jumping to throw items higher 

Controls:
  • Arrows or A/D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • E or mouse left-click to grab items
  • R or mouse right-click to throw items
  • Esc to go to the start menu (and lose your progress)
Weekly Game Jam

This game was made for the weekly game jam.

Week 7, 2017. Theme: Overgrown
